class_notes:
Description:
In this course, we will examine theories that address how status, power, and legitimacy processes operate in small group interaction and how these interactions on the micro-level link to social inequality on the meso- and macro- levels. We will see the development and extension of theories in the status, power, and legitimacy areas, as well as review the empirical support for these theories. We will also discuss the various new directions in each of these areas.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3990, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-4p, Instructor: C. Johnson, Status: Closed
